name: Modules Kit – Beaver Builder Modules
author: Techeshta

sections.description:
Modules Kit is a Beaver Builder Modules collection with unlimited possibilities to design a webpage. You can build professional, elegant websites using the new WordPress editor Beaver Builder with very ease and without any code. It is a large variety of beautiful modules that can develop and design your best web pages with some clicks.

Documentation

It is a bunch of additional Beaver Builder modules for Editors, Content Writers, and freelancers to provide all possible options.

Where is Modules Kit Plugin Useful?

Below is one small list for which purposes you can use the Modules Kit.

  • Modules for Editors
  • Modules for Content Writers
  • Modules for Freelancers
  • Modules for Designer
  • Modules for Developer

Why Choose a Modules Kit for your Beaver Builder Project?

We carefully researched over minimum requirements of any website development. And then created a list of options over the selected modules that we are thinking of designing and provide it as free, and you can see the result here.

We offered all possible opportunities with all Beaver Builder modules. So, from beginner to freelance – designer, developer, writer, and content creator can create awesome stuff with the new Beaver Builder editor. We have 5+ Beaver Builder Modules available as a start.

Features of Modules Kit

  • Designed for Editors, Content Writers and Freelancers
  • Highly Optimized and Performance Focused
  • Extensive Attributes for Each Module
  • Faster Designing Experience
  • Seamless Interplay with the Core Beaver Builder Modules
  • Cross-browser Compatibility
  • No Coding Skill Needed

List of Beaver Builder Modules

Get 5+ flexible Beaver Builder Modules that are feature-rich and look right out of the box, and provide a robust foundation for any website even without a single line of code.

  • Call to action
  • Infobox
  • Our Team
  • Pull Quotes
  • Testimonial
  • Progress Bar
  • Dual Button
  • Flipbox
  • Pricing Table

Technical Support

We’re active for any support issues and feature suggestions. So, I hope you will love it. If you have any more questions, visit our support on the Plugin’s Forum. Feel free to contact us if you want any custom widgets for your site.

Like Modules Kit Plugin?

Don’t forget to rate us on WordPress.
sections.installation:
From Your WordPress Dashboard

  1. Go to Plugins >Add New
  2. Search for Modules Kit – Beaver Builder Modules
  3. Click on Install Now Button
  4. Click on Activate Now After Installed in the Backend

From WordPress.org

  1. Download Modules Kit – Beaver Builder Modules
  2. Upload the ‘modules-kit’ folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate Modules Kit plugin from your plugins page
sections.faq:
How do I start using Modules Kit?

To get the full experience of the next-generation WordPress Page Builder, you’ll need the latest version of Beaver Builder installed on your website.

Do I Need Coding Skills To Use Modules Kit?

Not! Modules Kit for Beaver Editor is as easy to use as you can think. It works just like Beaver Builder Module, and you don’t need to code.

Will Modules Kit Slow Down My Site?

Not. We built Modules Kit with performance in mind. It’s built to the standards of Beaver Builder. Hence all the required styling is compiled when you use Modules.

Is Modules Kit free to use?

Yes! Modules Kit core features are free.

Where can I ask for help?

Please reach out via the official support forum on WordPress.org.

screenshots.caption: Call to action: Showcase call to action to get your leads
Infobox: Showcase your services and information about your business
Our Team: Showcase your team members and their information
Pull Quotes: Showcase your details with quotes
Testimonial: Showcase your testimonials with client names
Dual button: Design your own buttons or click-to-actions
Pricing table: Showcase your pricing plans
